mapper.sql: id, serialNo, operate_type, operate_module, remark, module_id, module_name, request, success, teller, org, create_time, update_time
mapper.insert: insert into conf_operate_info (id, serialNo, operate_type, operate_module, remark, module_id, module_name, request, success, teller, org, create_time, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{serialNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operateType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{operateModule,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{moduleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{moduleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{request,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{success,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{teller,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{org,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.update:
update conf_operate_info
serial_no = #{serialNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operate_type = #{operateType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
operate_module = #{operateModule,jdbcType=INTEGER},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
module_id = #{moduleId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
module_name = #{moduleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
request = #{request,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

teller = #{teller,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
org = #{org,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update conf_operate_info set serial_no = #{serialNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operate_type = #{operateType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, operate_module = #{operateModule,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, module_id = #{moduleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, module_name = #{moduleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, request = #{request,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, success = #{success,jdbcType=INTEGER}, teller = #{teller,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, org = #{org,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select count(1) from conf_invok_info t
and t.operate_type like '%${operateType}%'
and t.operate_module like '%${operateModule}%'

select t.* from conf_invok_info t
and t.operate_type like '%${operateType}%'
and t.operate_module like '%${operateModule}%'
order by t.id desc limit #{startNum},#{pageSize}
